text:
Evidation Health | Full-time | VISA | ONSITE in Menlo Park, CA or Santa Barbara, CA

http://evidation.com/careers We're helping new types of digital health products find their way to people who need them most. We have offices in Menlo Park and Santa Barbara and we're well-funded by venture firms who deeply understand healthcare. We're looking for teammates in software engineering, data science, and product. The team is a pretty unique blend of backgrounds: search, mobile targeting, data, health outcomes, traditional healthcare, and precision medicine. There is a lot of learning on all sides.
